info.description: This is the API that serves as the central interaction point between the client and back-end services of Earthdata Pub.
info.title: EarthdataPub

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start of the time range to view

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End of the time range to view

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Type of events to view, e.g. workflow_transitions, errors, logins

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: True will return a count of events of the given type within the time range, false will return the individual events and their associated data.

post.description: Sends a client-side event to the system to be logged. Typically this would be an error.

DashboardRequest.description: Request body sent to Dashboard endpoint.

InformationRequest.description: Request body sent to Information endpoint.

InvokeRequest.description: Request body sent to external action request handler.

NotifyRequest.description: Request body sent to external notification request handler.

SubmissionRequest.description: Request body sent to external Submission endpoint.

SubscriptionRequest.description: Request body sent to external Subscription endpoint.

RegisterRequest.description: Request body sent to external notification request handler.

MetricsRequest.description: Request body for logging a client-side event.

Form.description: A template for a form with a collection of sections containing questions.

Question.description: A grouping of related inputs to be displayed on a form

Service.description: An external service connected with the EDPUB API.

Workflow.description: A series of steps for processing a Submission

ActionStep.description: An action step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'action'.

FormStep.description: A form step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'form'.

ReviewStep.description: A review step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'review'.

ServiceStep.description: A service step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'service'.
